Title: Relates to including pain management medications on a death certificate where a death is caused by an opioid overdose
Summary: Includes pain management medications that the decedent was prescribed, such as gabapentin, on a death certificate where a death is caused by an opioid overdose.
LawCode: Amd ยง4141, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including pain management medications on a death certificate where a death is caused by an opioid overdose
